snippet: EGGERTH--Marta. We mourn the death of our dear friend Marta and will never forget her magnificent voice and the joy she brought to us and her multitude of fans. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Marjan Kiepura and his wife Jane. Robert J Camp...
lead_paragraph: EGGERTH--Marta. We mourn the death of our dear friend Marta and will never forget her magnificent voice and the joy she brought to us and her multitude of fans. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Marjan Kiepura and his wife Jane. Robert J Campbell, M.D., Cesare L Santeramo
